policy_default.jcr:description: Sets the title size to H3.
policy_default.jcr:title: Content Download

policy_default.jcr:description: Sets the title size to H3.
policy_default.jcr:title: Content Teaser

policy_default.jcr:description: Allows the page components and defines the component mapping (this configures what components should be automatically created when authors drop assets from the content finder to the page editor).
policy_default.jcr:title: CSS Grid Content Container

policy_root.jcr:description: Allows the template components and defines the component mapping (this configures what components should be automatically created when authors drop assets from the content finder to the page editor).
policy_root.jcr:title: Page Root

policy_page.jcr:description: Allows only H1 and disallows links for the main page title.
policy_page.jcr:title: Page Title

policy_default.jcr:description: Allows all sizes, but not H1, which is reserved for the main page title.
policy_default.jcr:title: Content Title

policy_default.jcr:description: - Enable lazy loading for faster page loading. - Define allowed image widths for automatic loading of the image in the most optimal resolution, given the size at which each image is displayed on the page, and the visitor's pixel density. - Disallow direct asset upload, to force authors to first upload the images to Assets.
policy_default.jcr:title: Content Image

policy_xf.jcr:title: My Site Language Navigation - Experience Fragment

policy_default.jcr:description: Allows the form components to be dropped into this form container.
policy_default.jcr:title: Content Form
